# What shapes consumer behaviour? 

As described by @RN1 current research indicate that laundering behaviours are predominantly shaped by three different factors: Social conventions (i.e. culture), individual concerns (e.g. psychological drivers and barriers), and the availability of technological aids (e.g. washing machines or tumble dryers).
